Package fr.lirmm.chocominer.app.declarative.verifiers

Class DeclarativeVerifier

java.lang.Object
fr.lirmm.chocominer.app.declarative.verifiers.DeclarativeVerifier
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChocoMiningVerifier
public abstract class DeclarativeVerifier extends Object
The main task of a Verifier is to verify whether a certain combination of constraints (AbstractConstraint) is valid. Meaning that certain constraints put together either cause errors, return incoherent results or return nothing at all. This class is meant to catch these errors and avoid them.

      public abstract void verifyAll() throws InvalidDeclarativeConstraintsException
      Verifies and validates all the constraint contained in the experience.
      Throws:
      InvalidDeclarativeConstraintsException - if the combination of declarative constraints are not valid.
